summary.para: The entity class used to store reports in the Reports V2 Module.
Initializes a new instance of the ReportDataV2 class.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.#ctor(System.Type)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the ReportDataV2 class.

member.param: A object specifying the data type that the report data source is bound to.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.Content
member.value: A byte array that is the report content.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.DataTypeCaption

summary.para: Gets the type caption of persistent objects that are displayed within the report.

member.value: A string that specifies the type caption of persistent objects that are displayed within the report.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.DataTypeName

summary.para: Gets the name of the report's data type.

member.value: A string which is the name of the report's data type.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.DisplayName
member.value: A string which is the report's display name.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.ID
member.value: An integer which is the entity identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.IsInplaceReport

summary.para: Specifies whether or not the report is inplace.

member.value: true, if the report is inplace; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.IsPredefined

summary.para: Gets a boolean value that indicates whether or not the report is predefined.

member.value: true, if a report is predefined in code; false, if a report is created at runtime.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.ParametersObjectType

summary.para: Specifies the type of the reports parameter object.

member.value: A System.Type of an object that specifies report parameters (typically, the descendant).

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.ParametersObjectTypeName

summary.para: Specifies the name of the reports parameter object type.

member.value: A string which is the name of the reports parameter object type.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.PredefinedReportType

summary.para: Specifies the type of the predefined report.

member.value: A System.Type object that specifies the type of the predefined report.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.EF.ReportDataV2.PredefinedReportTypeName

summary.para: Specifies the name of the reports parameter object type.

member.value: A string which is the name of the reports parameter object type.
